document.title: Classification And Regression Trees, Cart - A User Manual For Identifying Indicators Of Vulnerability To Famine And Chronic Food Insecurity
document.abstract: ue, the Netherlands, Norway, the Philippines, the Rockefeller Foundation, the Rural Industries Research and Development Corporation (Australia), South Africa, the Southern African Development Bank, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, the United Nations Children's Fund, the United States, and the World Bank.
